title: URF Questions
body:
Got some questions.

1. So, I've been playing URF and the cooldown on my ultimate is pretty low. If I buy new CDR items, will it get even lower?
2. Can you teleport out of a battle when people are focusing you?
3. Are gold generation items rendered inefficient in URF mode?

What do you guys think?

replies.body:
>    So, I've been playing URF and the cooldown on my ultimate is pretty low. If I buy new CDR items, will it get even lower?

No, you sit at a maximum 80% CDR (with whatever exceptions are implemented by Rito)
    
>Can you teleport out of a battle when people are focusing you?

Teleport can be used unless one of 2 things happen, you get stuned in some form that stops the teleport, or the tower you are teleporting to is destroyed.
  
>  Are gold generation items rendered inefficient in URF mode?

No they aren't, but considering that URF means that kills are the majority of gold, they certainly don't do as much as getting kills does.
